document.docAuthor: Astafurova, Yulia V. & Proshchalykin, Maxim Yu.
document.masterDocTitle: Review of the Epeolus tarsalis species group (Hymenoptera: Apidae, Epeolus Latreille, 1802), with description of a new species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Review of the Epeolus tarsalis species group (Hymenoptera: Apidae, Epeolus Latreille, 1802), with description of a new species

mods:name.mods:affiliation: Zoological Institute, Russian Academy of Sciences, Universitetskaya Nab., 1, Saint Petersburg, 199034, Russia. Yulia. Astafurova @ zin. ru; https: // orcid. org / 0000 - 0003 - 0557 - 7792

bibRefCitation.author: Morawitz, F.
bibRefCitation.refString: Morawitz, F. (1874) Die Bienen Daghestans. Horae Societatis Entomologicae Rossicae, 10 (2 / 4), 129 - 189.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Epeolus tarsalis
Morawitz, 1874: 182–183
, ♀ , ♂ ( type locality: Dagestan , Russia ).

Epeolus praeustus Pérez, 1884: 324–326
, ♀ ( type locality: Pyrenees).

?
Epeolus sibiricus
Radoszkowski, 1887: 295
, ♀ , ♂ ( type locality: Vladivostok , Russia ).

Epeolus rozenburgensis
van Lith, 1949: 105–112
, ♀ ( type locality: the Netherlands ).

Epeolus himukanus
Hirashima, 1955: 40–41
, ♂ ( type locality: Kyushu , Japan ).

Epeolus tarsalis
ssp. tirolensis van Lith, 1956: 99
, ♀ ( type locality: Tirol , Austria ).

Epeolus tarsalis himukanus : Hirashima & Tadauchi 1979: 122
;
Mitai & Tadauchi 2009: 71
.
